text:
e="preserve">Starfire (Princess Koriand'r) is a fictional superheroine appearing in books published by DC Comics. She made her first appearance in "DC Comics Presents" #26 (October 1980). She was created by Marv Wolfman and George Pérez.
The name "Starfire" first appeared in a DC Comic in the story "The Answer Man of Space", in "Mystery in Space" #73, February 1962, written by Gardner F. Fox.
In 2013, Starfire placed 21st on IGN's "Top 25 Heroes of DC Comics".
Starfire has appeared in many cartoon television shows and movies, including as a member of the Teen Titans in Cartoon Network's eponymous series, voiced by Hynden Walch. She also appears in the DC Universe series "Titans", played by Anna Diop.
